description: This file defines an Angular service named AuthService responsible for managing user authentication state, including login, signup, logout, and session initialization, leveraging Supabase for backend authentication.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: An Angular service for handling user authentication status and session management.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the AuthService and checks the existing session to set authentication state.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in a user with provided email and password, updating authentication state upon success.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Registers a new user with the provided email and password.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and updates authentication state to reflect this.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Returns an observable reflecting whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns an observable with the user ID or null if not logged in.
